Cooking Omlets - With Thomas!

Thomas

Today we will cook some Omlets. Yeah!

Directions
  1. Crack those Eggs!
  2. Scramble-ramble those eggs
  3. Put the stuff in the thing!
  4. Put it in a pan
  5. Watch it cook
  6. Eat the eggs!
Ingredients
  • Eggs
  • Onion
  • Butter
  • Tomato
  • Ham
  • Cheddar Cheese
  • Pancake batter
Additional Tools
  • Don't forget to bring a Thomas
